short_summary: Aircraft Hydraulic, Vacuum and De-Icing System Components
tags: Aircraft Hydraulic, Vacuum and De-Icing System Components
full_summary:
### Tender Notice

#### Contract Title and Status
The contract, titled "Cancelled-W8482-230704/A", has been cancelled.

#### Solicitation Number and Amendment Number
The solicitation number is PW-22-01006513, and there has been one amendment made to the original tender notice.

#### Tender Details
The tender notice was published on September 12, 2022, and was scheduled to close on October 17, 2022, at 2:00 PM. However, the tender was cancelled, and therefore, there is no expected start and end date for the contract.

#### Industry Classification
The contract falls under the industry classification of N1650 - Aircraft Hydraulic, Vacuum and De-Icing System Components.

#### Procurement Method
The tender was issued through a competitive process, open to all qualified suppliers.

#### Trade Agreements
The contract is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Geographic Region
The contract is intended for bidirectional transportation between regions in British Columbia, and between regions in Nova Scotia.

#### Contracting Authority
The contracting authority for this tender is the Department of National Defence, located in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada.

#### Points of Contact
For any questions or information regarding this tender notice, please contact Adele Morgan-McGoey, with the Department of National Defence, at adele.morgan-mcgoey@forces.gc.ca.

Note that I intend to remove all extra spaces between the output lines, and use tables for the bidirectional transportation. Let me know if you need anything else!  have a nice day!
